home.introduction:
Hello! I'm a front-end developer from South Korea.
I love contributing to open-source projects as much as I have learned from them.
I am interested in various fields including backend, networking, and system programming.
about.title: Using Technology for Creative Problem Solving
about.description:
I specialize in developing scalable and high-performance front-end projects, from small websites to large applications.
While I mainly use Angular and React, I prefer selecting the most efficient technology for solving problems.
I enjoy contributing back to open source as much as I have gained from it, and I am involved in various projects.
about.contact_me: Need to contact me? Send an email to winetree94@gmail.com.
about.profile.description: I go by the nickname winetree94 online. Here are the platforms I am active on.
about.qualifications.description: I can design the optimal tech stack for various business environments, from On-Premise to PaaS and SaaS, and execute projects from start to finish.
about.qualifications.frontend.1: Design and development of web applications (CRA/SSG/SSR) based on Angular/React
about.qualifications.frontend.2: Project design and development based on ECMAScript/DOM API
about.qualifications.frontend.3: Development of module libraries using CommonJS/ES Module
about.qualifications.frontend.4: Operation of modern web bundlers like Webpack/Vite
about.qualifications.frontend.5: Design and development of desktop application projects using Electron, Tauri, etc.
about.qualifications.frontend.6: Handling cross-browser issues for Internet Explorer, Safari, etc.
about.qualifications.frontend.7: Design and development of WebView projects for iOS/Android support
about.qualifications.others.1: Deployment system setup and cost optimization for cloud platforms like Cloudflare/AWS/Azure
about.qualifications.others.2: Setup and management of container deployment systems based on Docker
about.qualifications.others.3: Setup and management of CI/CD environments like Github Actions/Circle CI
about.experience.swit.title: Swit Korea
about.experience.swit.main: Swit is a groupware SaaS used by over 40,000 teams and organizations worldwide. As a front-end engineer at Swit, I participated in various projects.
about.experience.swit.features.editor.de: Designed and implemented a text editor that supports all platforms to eliminate functionality differences across Swit's clients.
about.experience.swit.features.editor.ro: Established a monorepo and NPM distribution system for feature-based modules
Implemented core editor based on ProseMirror
Developed Android/iOS editor based on WebView
about.experience.swit.features.auth.desc: Designed and implemented an integrated authentication solution to reduce development costs and provide consistent functionality across Swit's clients.
about.experience.swit.features.auth.roll: Implemented UI for the integrated authentication service
Synchronized authentication information across tabs using Broadcast API
Developed a session management client library for web services
about.experience.swit.features.design_sy: Designed and implemented a design system to eliminate UI/UX differences across Swit's web services and speed up business development.
Implemented numerous components like Modal, Layer, Virtual Scroll
Set up automatic deployment systems with Github Actions and NPM
Established component testing and documentation system with Storybook
Built a translation system to support 14 languages efficiently and manage translation data.
Removed code dependencies of translations by adopting ICU MessageFormat
Implemented back-office for automating entire data processes
about.experience.swit.features.task.desc: Renewed Swit's existing task management system and conducted large-scale performance optimizations.
about.experience.swit.features.task.roll: Implemented plugin to define task states
Developed Kanban/Tree view library based on virtual scroll
about.experience.swit.activity.1: Lead developer for cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android) text editor library
about.experience.swit.activity.2: Lead developer for cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android) integrated authentication solution
about.experience.swit.activity.4: Built multi-language support system based on ICU MessageFormat
about.experience.swit.activity.5: Renewed and optimized task management system
about.experience.epapyrus.title: Epapyrus
about.experience.epapyrus.main: Epapyrus is an electronic document platform used by over 1,200 clients in South Korea. As a senior researcher at Epapyrus, I participated in various projects.
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pen.d: Implemented a feature allowing users to input handwritten signatures on the web.
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pen.r: Developed UI for pen handwriting input
Optimized vectors using linear interpolation and BÃ©zier curves
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pki.d: Implemented a feature allowing users to sign PDF documents using a public certificate.
about.experience.epapyrus.features.pki.r: Developed UI for the digital signature form and process
Integrated modules for public certificates from Korea Electronic Certification and Dream Security
about.experience.epapyrus.activity.2: Developed PKI/TSI public certification digital signature service
about.experience.playauto.title: Playauto
about.experience.playauto.main: Playauto is an integrated solution that manages all operations of numerous online shops. As a full-stack developer on the global team, I participated in various projects.
about.experience.playauto.features.multi: Implemented a multi-framework architecture to gradually replace AngularJS due to its end of life.
Developed migration tools for framework replacement
about.experience.playauto.features.datat: Re-implemented the datatable library based on jQuery, significantly improving page rendering performance.
Developed a virtual scroll table library
Replaced all table libraries within the app
about.experience.playauto.features.pa_gl: Handled full-stack development for the global shopping mall integration service.
Integrated APIs for international shopping malls like eBay, Shopee
Implemented detailed front-end UI for each sales stage
about.experience.playauto.activity.1: Developed full-stack for the 'PA Global' service
about.experience.playauto.activity.2: Developed a datatable library for efficient rendering of large datasets
about.experience.playauto.activity.3: Integrated multiple international shopping mall backends like eBay, Shopee, Lazada
about.experience.playauto.activity.4: Developed a multi-framework architecture for technology replacement
about.experience.jdlab.title: JDLab
about.experience.jdlab.main: Swit is a groupware SaaS used by over 40,000 teams and organizations worldwide. As a front-end engineer at Swit, I participated in various projects.
about.experience.jdlab.features.exim.des: Implemented the Android app and backend for the online rehabilitation service 'Exim'.
about.experience.jdlab.features.exim.rol: Developed backend services based on Spring
Implemented Android app and video services
about.experience.jdlab.features.bupasa.d: Implemented the full-stack for the accessory shopping service 'Bupasa'.
about.experience.jdlab.features.bupasa.r: Developed SPA service based on Vue 2
Developed backend services based on Spring
about.experience.jdlab.activity.1: Developed Android app and backend for 'Exim' rehabilitation service
about.experience.jdlab.activity.2: Developed full-stack for 'Bupasa' accessory shopping web service
about.open_source.edybara.title: Edybara
about.open_source.edybara.description: Creating a rich text editor library for browsers. The project aims to make it easier and faster for businesses to adopt ProseMirror.
about.open_source.edybara.features.1: Provides rich features and extensibility based on ProseMirror.
about.open_source.edybara.features.2: Feature-based modules can be used independently with a monorepo structure.
about.open_source.edybara.features.3: Supports various formats and is easily customizable by users.
about.open_source.qdocs.title: Qdocs
about.open_source.qdocs.description: A tool for creating presentations specialized in animations. I started it because I often have to present in my company or external activities, and existing presentation tools were inconvenient.
about.open_source.qdocs.features.1: Build presentations by scenes instead of pages.
about.open_source.qdocs.features.2: Supports offline storage, usable in any environment where the browser is supported.
about.open_source.vector_optimizer.title: Vector Optimizer
about.open_source.vector_optimizer.descr: A utility to make drawings on the web look more natural. Started to solve the issue of jagged lines when drawing with touch or pen.
about.open_source.vector_optimizer.featu: Optimizes user input coordinates to enhance storage efficiency and rendering performance.
Corrects user input to smooth curves using BÃ©zier curve characteristics.
A library for fast rendering of large data sets through virtual scrolling. Implemented Android's RecyclerView for the web to overcome the issue of web being slower than apps.
Renders only the elements at the user's scroll position from the entire scroll.
Reuses elements out of view to enhance scrolling performance.
projects.title: Not much here. These are the projects I have created or am currently working on.
projects.description: I mostly create projects to solve problems in my work or daily life.
